synopsis.text:
Left for dead after a brutal assault, Joe Logan, once a formidable ninja assassin, had sought solace in the tranquility of rural America with his beloved family. But when his past catches up to him, his peaceful existence is obliterated, as his family is brutally murdered by his former clan. Miraculously surviving the attack, Joe reawakens in a hospital, fueled by an insatiable thirst for vengeance.

Re-emerging as his former self, the legendary Ninja Kamui, Joe embarks on a blood-soaked journey to bring down the very organization he once served. With an ancient skillset that defies the odds against modern weaponry, Kamui faces off against trained assassins, deadly cyborgs, and rival ninjas in a ruthless quest for retribution.

Aided by the relentless detective duo, Emma Samanda and Mike Moriss, Kamui will stop at nothing to annihilate the demons of his past and reclaim his future. In this high-stakes game of cat and mouse, only one thing is certain: vengeance will be his.
